Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Andurian raid campaign of Capellan worlds continues Ever since the Andurian War (or Andurian Crises as some call it) started with the Magistracy and Duchy of Andurian alliance assaulting the Capellan Confederation on a wide front, raids on supposedly safe Capellan planets have been a cornerstone of the Andurian strategy. Carson’s Renegades and the Fifth Defenders have been almost exclusively used for these tasks, and in May, they have struck two worlds - [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Hustaing],Hustaing]] and [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Jasmine],Jasmine]].

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: The Renegades' raid on the 9th of May was lightning fast. Initially, some residents mistook the raiders for the vanguard of Candace Liao, who had returned to the Confederacy in order to take the Celestial Throne - an easy mistake for rash minds to make, considering that the planet is bordering [[DM.Factions[faction_Ives],St. Ives Compact’s]] territory. This resulted in some initial celebrations, but citizens soon realized their mistake. The Renegades, their mission complete, were soon boosting for orbit. The Fifth Defenders' raid on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Jasmine],Jasmine]] was a somewhat more violent ten-day operation. The Fifth Defenders easily suppressed the local air forces and managed to beat back attacks from Warrior House Ijori, which is still decimated from losses suffered in the 4th Succession War. The Fifth Defenders managed to seize large quantities of medical supplies and machinery, which they loaded onto a number of captured civilian DropShips before leaving the planet. Some pundits have been speculating that the anemic responses from CCAF to these raids are indicative of the horrific losses the Capellans have suffered in recent wars. This has been the CNB May broadcast.
